trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations and descriptions of ASP.NET Web services.
trans-unit.target: 取得 ASP.NET Web 服務的檔案位置和描述。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern>類別繼承自抽象<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>類別，並運用所<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>類別的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，用來處理 HTTP 要求的探索文件。

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，任何類別需要由開發人員直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The file-system path of the Web service's .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務的 .asmx 檔案之檔案系統路徑。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> object for the specified .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定 .asmx 檔案的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> object with the specified file name for its .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> 物件，其 .asmx 檔案具有指定的檔名。

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.

A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> instance contains the location of the .asmx file and the corresponding Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, which can be dynamically obtained by appending a wsdl query string to the .asmx file path.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>執行個體會包含.asmx 檔案和對應的 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件，可動態地將 wsdl 查詢字串附加到.asmx 檔案路徑的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: 取得要當做搜尋目標使用的檔名模式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.asmx" indicates an ASP.NET Web service file extension.
trans-unit.target: 「 *.Asmx 」 的模式表示 ASP.NET Web 服務檔案延伸模組。
